lines.line: I can't belive Xilo hasn't shown up.
Were you expecting to meet someone here?
My... friend, Xilo. I told her to meet me by the magic trees of the rainforest. We don't often have a chance to meet without a crowd of people around.
Why? Is she not particularly local to you?
Unfortunately not. I'm from Aldarin, but she lives in Tal Teklan. It usually takes a special event being hosted for us both to be in the same place.
So you never really get any privacy?
Privacy? Are you insinuating something?
Not at all. Sorry if it seemed like I was.
It's okay... Sorry... I just miss her.
Do you think she's just running a little late?
It's possible.
Could she maybe have considered another tree magical?
I suppose she may be where we first met... but this is where we shared our first... you know...
Well, I'll keep my fingers crossed for you. I'm sure you'll be able to find one another soon!
Thank you, iknami.
Hang on... I think I might have met this Xilo.
You have? Where is she?
By a tree to the north of here.
Oh, Xilo! She's gone to where we first met instead! Thank you, iknami. I'll head over there at once!
I can't believe she's done this.
Who's done this?
Fabia! She asked me to meet her, and I quote, 'by the special tree'. You may notice that she isn't here! I've been waiting for hours!
Do you think she might just be delayed?
I know her too well. She wouldn't be delayed coming to see me.
Could you be at the wrong special tree?
No! This is the one, singular, special tree!
Humour me for just a moment. What if, amongst this entire rainforest, there's a second very similar tree?
And Fabia would find herself at the wrong tree in this scenario?
Or maybe it's you who is at the wrong one?
No, absolutely not! I know where to meet Fabia and I wouldn't miss any opportunity to do so!
This was the tree where we first met. It was a lovely day! A botanical tour of the rainforest, but the only thing I found myself looking at was her...
Well, I'm sure the two of you will find each other soon. However, I do suspect that might happen sooner if you considered looking by some other trees...
Hmm... I'll think about it, but for now, I'll wait here a while longer.
Hang on... I think I might have met this Fabia.
You have? Where is she?
South of here, by some magic trees.
The magic trees? Of course! How could I have been so stupid! Thank you, iknami. I'll head over right away!
Hello again, iknami! Thank you for helping us find each other!
To think we were waiting by different trees! It was so silly of us!
Well, I'm happy to see you together again. Now, I'm sure you have a lot of catching up to do. I'll leave you to it.
Timoiva, iknami!

characters.name: Fabia
characters.description: Young adult female, warm Mediterranean accent, gentle and wistful tone, a romantic woman from Aldarin who is longing and slightly melancholic while waiting for her beloved.

characters.name: Xilo
characters.description: Young adult female, lively Mediterranean accent, passionate and spirited tone, an impatient romantic from Tal Teklan who is frustrated but deeply devoted to the one she loves.
